text: Thank you for your reply, I didn't know how to explain it so I decided to leave it at that, but wow did it help me a lot!!!
It looks like this API has been rewritten since this original post?
What are you currently seeing from the API?
Is that original implementation of your SET_PLAYER_STATUS still working?
:confused: maybe something is broken somewhere else for us
I'll have to inspect that client's project and see if they're still implementing that. Send me a PM and I'll respond back directly after I check it.
